scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,magenta" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install-all: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "PROJECT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,blue,magenta" "npm run install-project" "npm run install-backend" "npm run install-frontend"
scripts.clean-all: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "PROJECT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,blue,magenta" "npm run clean-project" "npm run clean-backend" "npm run clean-frontend"
